verbose_text: The family of sirtuin enzymes were identified as NAD + dependent protein deacylases (modifying acetyl, succinyl, malonyl palmitoyl, and glutaryl groups [27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32]) producing nicotinamide and O-acetyl-ADP-ribose as products of the deacylation reaction.
